paragraphs.text:
%spark
 
val target_file = "/data/video.csv"
 
val df = spark
  .read
  .option("header", true)
  .option("inferSchema", true)
  .option("nullValue", "NULL")
  .csv(target_file)
 
df.cache
df.createOrReplaceTempView("game_sales")

msg.data:
target_file: String = /data/video.csv
df: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [Name: string, Platform: string ... 13 more fields]
res3: df.type = [Name: string, Platform: string ... 13 more fields]

paragraphs.text:
%sql
 
select * from game_sales
where Platform = 'NES' -- NESはファミコンのことです。
order by JP_Sales desc
limit 30
